## mapVN variable

Like [mapVV](./vectors.mapvv.md)<!-- -->, but for [VecOpVN](./vectors.vecopvn.md) type ops and hence using a single vector input buffer `a` and a scalar `n`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
mapVN: (op: import("@thi.ng/api").Fn3<import("./api").Vec | null, import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, number, import("./api").Vec>, out: IVector<any>, a: IVector<any>, n: number, num: number, so?: number, sa?: number) => import("./api").Vec
```
